title: Bengals aim to retain trio of stars, sources say
description: The Bengals will attempt to secure a trio of stars who need new deals -- wide receivers Ja'Marr Chase and Tee Higgins and defensive end Trey Hendrickson -- for the long term this offseason, sources told ESPN.
author: Jeremy Fowler

title: Agent: Impossible to pay Clark true WNBA worth
description: Caitlin Clark's agent doesn't think it's possible for the Fever star to be paid "what she's really worth" and that CBA talks should "move the line forward a lot."
author: Michele Steele

title: 'It's out of this world' - Everton fans get first glimpse of new stadium
description: Everton fans get their first view inside the club's new ground at a Bramley-Moore Dock Stadium test event.

title: Fewer goals than Antony and January regrets - the problems facing Amorim
description: The mounting problems facing Ruben Amorim as Manchester United sink closer to their worst-ever Premier League campaign.

title: Neville: Arsenal have 'hope' in PL title race | Redknapp predicts 'edgy' battle
description: Gary Neville thinks Arsenal would have gained "hope" in the Premier League title race despite Liverpool's win over Wolves, while Jamie Redknapp believes there are still plenty of twists and turns to come before the title's destination is decided.

title: Man City rediscover flair as Merino steps up for Arsenal
Dodgers leveled up again, and 29 teams have themselves to blame
description: LA followed its World Series by winning the offseason. It wasn't a surprising outcome, and the Dodgers can thank teams unwilling to spend for their fortune.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: TGL Week 6: Ludvig Ã…berg leads The Bay past Justin Thomas, Atlanta Drive after Genesis Invitational win
description: LAGC appeared to be cruising toward a 3-0 record in TGL, but Atlanta came back to force overtime and win in the first match of the day.
author: Yahoo Sports
